title: WTB / WTTF: Mid to High Grade T206 Uzit
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: WTB / WTTF: Mid to High Grade T206 Uzit
posts.post_content:
If anyone has an interest in selling a solid condition Uzit T206 card ... I'm interested.  Will gladly pay cash or trade top-shelf items in return.

Looking for vg-ex or better condition -- with a preference for a '5' or better.

Regards,
Scott
